Title: Queen
Writer: Vikas Bahl (story and screenplay), Chaitally Parmar (story and screenplay), Parveez Sheikh (story and screenplay), Anvita Dutt Guptan (dialogue), Kangana Ranaut (dialogue)
Actors: Kangana Ranaut, Rajkummar Rao, Lisa Haydon, Jeffrey Ho
Plot: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.
